___allowEraseContentAndSettings.description: Supervised only. If set to false, the user cannot choose the option "Erase All Content and Settings" in Settings > General > Reset

___allowFindMyFriendsModification.description: If set to false, changes to Find My Friends are disabled.

___allowCamera.description: Allow the user to use the camera

___allowRemoteScreenObservation.description: Allow Classroom or similar to observe the screen. This key should be nested beneath allowScreenShot as a sub-restriction. If allowScreenShot is set to false, it also prevents the Classroom app from observing remote screens.

___allowEnterpriseAppTrust.description: If set to false removes the Trust Enterprise Developer button in Settings->General->Profiles Device Management, preventing apps from being provisioned by universal provisioning profiles. This restriction applies to free developer accounts but it does not apply to enterprise app developers who are trusted because their apps were pushed via MDM, nor does it revoke previously granted trust. Defaults to true.

___allowPassbookWhileLocked.description: If set to false, Wallet notifications will not be shown on the lock screen.

___allowLockScreenControlCenter.description: If false, prevents Control Center from appearing on the Lock screen.

___forceITunesStorePasswordEntry.description: Require the user's iTunes password to be entered for every purchase

___forceLimitAdTracking.description: If true, limits ad tracking. Default is false.

___allowAssistantUserGeneratedContent.description: When false, prevents Siri from querying user-generated content from the web.

___allowNews.description: Allow the user to access and use News

___forceAssistantProfanityFilter.description: Enable Siri Profanity Filter (Supervised devices only)

___allowAddingGameCenterFriends.description: Allow the user to add Friends on Game Center

___allowOpenFromUnmanagedToManaged.description: Enable allow open from unmanaged to managed

___allowAutoUnlock.description: If set to false, disallows macOS auto unlock. Defaults to true.

___PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.

___allowVoiceDialing.description: Allow voice dialing while device is locked

___allowPodcasts.description: If set to false, disables podcasts. Defaults to true.

___allowDiagnosticSubmissionModification.description: If set to false, the diagnostic submission and app analytics settings in the Diagnostics & Usage pane in Settings cannot be modified

___allowCloudBTMM.description: Allow iCloud Back to my Mac

___allowAppInstallation.description: Allow only a connected Mac host to install applications

___autonomousSingleAppModePermittedAppID.description: If present, allows apps identified by the bundle IDs listed in the array to autonomously enter Single App Mode.

items.description: App Bundle ID specified will be allowed to enter Single App Mode autonomously.

___allowiTunes.description: When false, the iTunes Music Store is disabled and its icon is removed from the Home screen. Users cannot preview, purchase, or download content.

___allowYouTube.description: When false, the YouTube application is disabled and its icon is removed from the Home screen.

___allowCloudPhotoLibrary.description: Allow iCloud Photo Library to be used on the device

___allowSpotlightInternetResults.description: If set to false, search results from the web will not be shown in Spotlight.

___allowSharedStream.description: If set to false, disabled Shared Stream.

___allowAppCellularDataModification.description: Allow modifying cellular data usage for apps settings

___allowAirDrop.description: Disable AirDrop if set to false

___allowOTAPKIUpdates.description: If false, over-the-air PKI updates are disabled. Setting this restriction to false does not disable CRL and OCSP checks. Default is true.

___allowAppRemoval.description: Allow the user to remove apps (Supervised only)

___allowOpenFromManagedToUnmanaged.description: Enable allow open from managed to unmanaged

___allowActivityContinuation.description: If set to false, Handoff will be disabled.

___allowCloudDesktopAndDocuments.description: If set to false, disallows macOS cloud desktop and document services. Defaults to true.

___allowUIConfigurationProfileInstallati.description: Supervised only. If set to false, the user is prohibited from installing configuration profiles and certificates interactively.

___forceAirPlayIncomingRequestsPairingPa.description: If set to true, forces all devices sending AirPlay requests to this device to use a pairing password.

___allowLockScreenTodayView.description: If set to false, the Today view in Notification Center on the lock screen is disabled.

___allowSafari.description: Allow the user to use Safari

___allowDiagnosticSubmission.description: Send diagnostic and usage reports to Apple

___allowAssistantWhileLocked.description: Allow Siri while device is locked

___ratingRegion.description: Two-character code for the region used to specify ratings

___allowUntrustedTLSPrompt.description: Allow user to accept untrusted TLS certificates

___allowExplicitContent.description: Allow user access of explicit content

___whitelistedAppBundleIDs.description: If present, allows only bundle IDs listed in the array from being shown or launchable.

___allowUIAppInstallation.description: When false, the App Store is disabled and its icon is removed from the Home screen. However, users may continue to use Host apps (iTunes, Configurator) to install or update their apps.

___allowPhotoStream.description: Allow Photo Stream to be used on the device

___allowPairedWatch.description: If set to false, disables pairing with an Apple Watch. Any currently paired Apple Watch is unpaired and erased. Defaults to true.

___allowManagedAppsCloudSync.description: Allow iCloud sync for managed apps

___allowMusicService.description: If set to false, Apple Music will be disabled in the Music app.

___allowFingerprintForUnlock.description: Allow Touch ID to Unlock Device

___PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

___allowCloudDocumentSync.description: Allow document syncing with iCloud. When false, disables document and key-value syncing to iCloud.

___allowBookstoreErotica.description: Supervised only. If set to false, the user will not be able to download media from the iBookstore that is tagged as erotica.

___allowPasscodeModification.description: If set to false, prevents the device passcode from being added, changed, or removed. Defaults to true. This restriction is ignored by shared iPads.

___blacklistedAppBundleIDs.description: If present, prevents bundle IDs listed in the array from being shown or launchable.

___allowEnterpriseBookMetadataSync.description: Allow enterprise books notes and highlights to be synced

___allowAutomaticAppDownloads.description: If set to false, prevents automatic downloading of apps purchased on other devices. Does not affect updates to existing apps. Defaults to true

___allowLockScreenNotificationsView.description: If set to false, the Notifications view in Notification Center on the lock screen is disabled and users can’t receive notifications when the screen is locked.

___allowCloudAddressBook.description: Allow macOS iCloud Address Book Services

___PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

___allowEnterpriseBookBackup.description: Allow enterprise books to be backed up

___safariAcceptCookies.description: Accept cookies: 0 - Never, 1 - From current website only (iOS 8) or visited sites (pre-iOS 8), 1.5 - From websites I visit, 2 - Always

___PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

___allowScreenShot.description: Allow the user to take screenshots or screen recordings

___allowRadioService.description: If set to false, Apple Music Radio is disabled.

___allowHostPairing.description: If set to false, host pairing is disabled with the exception of the supervision host. If no supervision host certificate has been configured, all pairing is disabled. Host pairing lets the administrator control which devices an iOS 7 device can pair with.

___allowBookstore.description: Supervised only. If set to false, iBookstore will be disabled.

___allowInAppPurchases.description: Allow the user to make purchases within applications

___forceAirPlayOutgoingRequestsPairingPa.description: If set to true, forces all devices receiving AirPlay requests from this device to use a pairing password.
